attributes.action: stop discrimination in all its forms within our society.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Throughout the 20th century great progress has been made to eradicate discrimination against women, ethnic minorities etc. 

Yet now in the 21st century discrimination has returned in the form of 'positive discrimination', used to push white males to the back of the queue in the public sector, politics (e.g. AWS) and (with the Equalities Bill) in the private sector.

We call on the Prime Minister to treat everyone with absolute equality regardless of gender, ethnicity or disability.
